long_description: Power up the Goal Zero Black Flash flashlight using the included USB charging cord. Its lithium-ion battery can be recharged from a USB port on your laptop or compatible Goal Zero solar rechargers. High-quality 1-watt Cree LED outputs 90 lumens on high and illuminates objects up to 20m away. A simple press of the button switches the flashlight from high to low. Internal battery can be recharged from a USB output found on a computer or solar panel; 4 hrs. of charging provides 2.5 hrs. of run time on high. The Goal Zero Bolt Focus flashlight includes a USB charging cord. Also comes with a lanyard that goes around your wrist, or use it to hang the flashlight.
short_description: Power up the Goal Zero Black Flash flashlight using the included USB charging cord. Its lithium-ion battery can be recharged from a USB port on your laptop or compatible Goal Zero solar rechargers.
